text: Dermot Joseph Kennedy (born 13 December 1991) is a musician and singer- songwriter from the Republic of Ireland. He is most famous for his 2019 single "Outnumbered". ==Personal life== Kennedy was born in Rathcoole, a village in County Dublin. He is a big fan of football and supports English club Manchester United. His auntie is TV personality Mary Kennedy. ==Music career== He started playing guitar when he was 10 years old and started writing songs when he was 14. When he was 17, he began busking in Dublin. He also used to travel to Boston in the United States to perform. As a teenager, Kennedy was invited to open for Glen Hansard, an Irish folk singer. Kennedy didn't become a well known artist until he was in his mid-20s. He reached fame with his single "Outnumbered", released in 2019, which reached number 6 in the UK Singles Chart. Some of his other well known songs include: *Power Over Me (2018) *Giants (2020) ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== *Without Fear (2019) ===Compilation albums=== *Dermot Kennedy (2019) ===EPs=== *Doves & Ravens (2017) *Mike Dean Presents: Dermot Kennedy (2018) *Lost in the Soft Light (2020) Category:1991 births Category:Irish singer-songwriters Category:Living people Category:People from County Dublin Category:Irish musicians Category:Irish pop singers
title: Dermot Kennedy
